participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and caring, with a passion for the arts and helping others.
participant_1.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally.

participant_2.name: Chloe
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and glamorous, always looking for the next trend and loves to be in the spotlight.
participant_2.background: i diet a lot. i like to tan in tanning beds. i am high maintenance. i love spending money. i love listening to britney spears.
